div.p: Secret analog generators are being developed in our underground laboratory. Stay tuned for more sonic extravaganza!

The MIDI Synth is a small but powerful digital/analog synthesizer. It has a very gritty, crude and organic 6-bit DAC, and an analog LP/BP filter. It can do chiptune sounds to perfection, but the grittiness is also wonderful for warm analog-style pads. It features 2 powerful LFOs and 2 envelope generators that can be combined in complex ways. These modulators can be used to control both digital and analog parameters. Multiple algorithms are available: 4 voice-polyphonic synth, multi-osc monophonic synth, FM-noise machine, drum box.
